results.title: [The effect of atenolol on contractility and hemodynamics of the infarcted heart in comparison to propranolol and practolol (author's transl)].

results.title: Early intravenous atenolol treatment in suspected acute myocardial infarction. Preliminary report of a randomised trial.
results.text_hl: 214 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were studied in a randomised trial to determine whether administraiton of intravenous @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ within 12 hours of @DISEASE_Chest_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@ reduced eventual @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ size, as estimated by cumulative enzyme release and by ECG changes. 135 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ already had ECG evidence of @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarction@@@ at entry; 72 received @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ which significantly decreased subsequent enzyme release (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and control means = 121 IU, SE +/- 10 and 177 IU, SE +/- 17; 2p < 0.005) and enhanced R-wave preservation (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and control means = 46% +/- 3 and 36% +/- 3; 2p < 0.02). 79 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ had no evidence of @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarction@@@ at entry; 44 did not receive @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and 27 of these subsequently developed @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarction@@@, whereas only 11 of 35 treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarcted@@@ during their hospital stay (2p < 0.01).

citations.NLM: Yusuf S, Ramsdale D, Peto R, Furse L, Bennett D, Bray C, Sleight P. Early intravenous atenolol treatment in suspected acute myocardial infarction. Preliminary report of a randomised trial. Lancet. 1980 Aug 9;2(8189):273-6. PMID: 6105436
citations.BibTeX: @article{6105436, title={Early intravenous atenolol treatment in suspected acute myocardial infarction. Preliminary report of a randomised trial.}, author={Yusuf S and Ramsdale D and Peto R and Furse L and Bennett D and Bray C and Sleight P}, journal={Lancet}, volume={2}, number={8189}, pages={273-6}}

results.title: Limitation of myocardial infarct size by atenolol, nadolol and propranolol in dogs.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@Infarct@@@ size was significantly reduced by @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nadolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009248 @@@nadolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@.

results.title: Atenolol. A reappraisal of its pharmacological properties and therapeutic use in cardiovascular disorders.
results.text_hl: Early intervention with intravenous @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ followed by oral maintenance therapy reduces @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ recurrence and cardiovascular mortality in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with known or suspected @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@.
